Reviews.Title: Rim BlackBerry 7100(Nextel)
Reviews.Author: Roderick
Reviews.Content: Ordered the Rim BlackBerry 7100(Nextel),  phone was described as new in box, box but when it arrived i could tell that this was a used/refurbished unit.  Never the less i overlooked thoses facts, because i needed a replacement phone and Nextel's are pricey.  When i powered on unit there was nothing.  I contacted the seller and they told me that i have might have to download and install the system for it.  Not really a problem, but that is something i think should have been check before they sent it to me, especially since they were advertising the unit as new.  After downloading and installing system unit worked okay, but some features did not work.  Will not buy from seller again.

Reviews.Title: Not Exactly
Reviews.Author: NATASHA SALTER
Reviews.Content: This product wasn't what I thought it was.  I wish I could return it and get my money back. I don't like it at all

Reviews.Title: My kids have better toy phones
Reviews.Author: C. Hernandez
Reviews.Content: Is this for real?  It looked like it came out of a gumball machine.  I returned it asap!

Reviews.Title: LOCKED: Can't use with T-Mobile or Sprint Sim Cards
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: To "Prepaid Mobile Partners" who sold this product to me,I did send you three return requests in last two weeks. No response so far.It does not make any sense at all for you to sell this crappy phone that always shows the "Sim Card Error" message. It doesn't accept prepaid T-Mobile or Sprint sim cards. Technically, I need to unlock it.So who did you sell this one to me. Is the way you do your business?I want my money back!!!TJ

Reviews.Title: Old Outdated Model
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Thompson
Reviews.Content: I didn't like this phone because the features can't be used due to the phone being so old. This phone will work if you are in a pinch.

Reviews.Title: The Best for Cuba
Reviews.Author: Jesus Navarrete
Reviews.Content: Very stronger, and work very fine with the Cuba new Cell phone services, it is the versatile for the poor services on Cuba

Reviews.Title: Should have offered to unlock for other cellphone services.
Reviews.Author: R. Slack
Reviews.Content: I love the phone all-be-it it feels light cheaply made. I have service thru Boost & it would have been nice if they would have offered to "unlock" it so as to be able to use this phone with whatever cellphone service one has.  Other than that it works GREAT!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
Offers complete BlackBerry smartphone functionality
Features such as push-to-talk long-range digital walkie-talkie
Has speakerphone, Bluetooth technology
GPS support for location-based services and polyphonic ringtones
Sleek and stylish device
ProductInfo.Name: Rim BlackBerry 7100(Nextel)
